# Environnement de travail

## Docker

```bash
docker run -d --name rstduio_4.2 -e PASSWORD=coucou -e DISABLE_AUTH=true -e USERID=1001 -e GROUPID=1001 -e ROOT=true -v /home/rochevin/Documents/:/workspace -p 8787:8787 rocker/verse:4.2.2
```

```yaml
services:
  rstudio:
    image: rocker/verse:4.2
    ports:
      - "8787:8787"
    environment:
      DISABLE_AUTH: true
      USERID: 1001
      GROUPID: 1001
      ROOT: true
      PASSWORD: coucou
    volumes:
      - /home/rochevin/Documents/:/workspace
```
